blocks.content: A Simple Utility for Lisbon Residents.

This lightweight website was built to help residents of Lisbon, Connecticut quickly check whether it's their recycling week — no digging through calendars or PDFs required. With a clean interface and location-aware features powered by the Google Maps API, users can easily find their recycling schedule and stay informed.

The site is designed for clarity and speed, offering a no-frills experience that gets straight to the point. Whether you're checking from your phone or desktop, it’s a practical tool that makes local life just a little more convenient.
